section.title: Image Commands
section.para: Save bitmap and vector images of the current view. The GUI is not required in order to save images -- using these commands from the command-line, for example, works just as well (models still have a current view, even without the GUI, and can be rotated, translated etc. just as if they were in the GUI).

section.title: savebitmap

listitem.para: savebitmap ( string format, string filename, int width, int height )
savebitmap ( string format, string filename, int width, int height, int quality )

section.para: Saves the current view as a bitmap image. Allowable values for format are:

If width and height are not specified the current dimensions of the view are used (800x600 if no GUI is present). The quality option determines the compression used on saved images, affecting, for example, the quality and size of jpegs and pngs, and should be an integer between 1 and 100 (with 100 being the best compression).
saves the current view to a file 'test.bmp'.
saves an enormous, highly uncompressed png.
